articles.title: Unfit people have an 98% increased risk of depression, study warns - Daily Mail
articles.description: In a seven-year study of more than 150,000 Brits, UK researchers found a link between low physical activity and different mental heath issues.
articles.content:
People with low aerobic and muscular fitness are almost twice as likely to be depressed and have a 60 per cent increased risk of anxiety, a new study warns.
